indic_aug.tda package¶

class indic_aug.tda.TDAugmentor(src_input_path, tgt_input_path, aligner, rare_word_count, vocab_dir, augment=True)[source]¶

Bases: indic_aug.globals.Augmentor

Class to augment parallel corpora by translation data augmentation (parallel) technique (refer: Fadaee et al. [5]).

Constructor method.

Parameters

  • src_input_path (str) – Path to aligned source corpus.

  • tgt_input_path (str) – Path to aligned target corpus, corresponding to the above source corpus.

  • aligner (indic_aug.align.Aligner) – Aligner to perform alignment between source and target sentences.

  • rare_word_count (int) – Bottom (least frequent) rare_word_count number of words are considered rare words.

  • vocab_dir (str) – As described in the docstring for indic_aug.vocab.Vocab.

  • augment (bool) – Performs augmentation if True, else returns original pair of sentences.

Submodules¶

indic_aug.tda.tda module¶

class indic_aug.tda.tda.TDAugmentor(src_input_path, tgt_input_path, aligner, rare_word_count, vocab_dir, augment=True)[source]¶

Bases: indic_aug.globals.Augmentor

Class to augment parallel corpora by translation data augmentation (parallel) technique (refer: Fadaee et al. [5]).

Constructor method.

Parameters

  • src_input_path (str) – Path to aligned source corpus.

  • tgt_input_path (str) – Path to aligned target corpus, corresponding to the above source corpus.

  • aligner (indic_aug.align.Aligner) – Aligner to perform alignment between source and target sentences.

  • rare_word_count (int) – Bottom (least frequent) rare_word_count number of words are considered rare words.

  • vocab_dir (str) – As described in the docstring for indic_aug.vocab.Vocab.

  • augment (bool) – Performs augmentation if True, else returns original pair of sentences.

indic_aug.tda.tda.extract_rare_words(vocab_dir, lang, word_count)[source]¶

Wrapper around Vocab.read_bottomn_vocab. The difference is that this function removes words that we do not want replaced according to the translation data augmentation (TDA) algorithm (refer: Fadaee et al. [5]).

Parameters

  • vocab_dir (str) – Path to directory containing sentencepiece *.model and *.vocab files, as described in indic_aug.vocab.

  • vocab_path (str) – Path to *.vocab file compatible with sentencepiece, corresponding to model at model_path.

  • word_count (int) – Number of words to include in the set of targeted words. Note that the actual number of words returned might be slightly less than the specified word_count as special tokens such as SOS, EOS, UNK, etc. are removed.

Returns

Output of Vocab.read_bottomn_vocab minus the special tokens we do not want replaced.

Return type

list
